item.description:
UPDATE: Commuter Train from North Station to Gloucester Station on the Rockport Line #2105 @ 10:15AM....arriving at 11:17AM The station is about one mile from the station so we will have to share a taxi or walk.
I will be on the platform at 9:55 AM wearing a big straw hat with pink feathers pinned up on one side.
Returning on #2120 @ 5:18PM...arriving 6:22PM. I will be on the platform by 5:00PM.


AVAST! This will be our 200th Meetup and the bonnie weather on Sunday is sure to entice all of you sassy wenches and bawdy buccaneers!!!



See the newly released facebook video here !

This is a joint meetup with members of Social Fun Group

Go back to the days of yesteryear, when Pirates invaded out coast and rules the sea! This event has stage performances of sword fighing on apirate ship!

We can take the commuter train from North Station to Gloucester (on the Rockport Line) and take the shuttle to Stage Fort Park. Limited street parking is available.

Photos of Annual New England Pirate Faire in Gloucester, MA click here

more detailed info

There will be musical and theatrical performances throughout the day on two different stages. This is a family friendly event.


Rain date: Sun, June 27th 12:00PM - 5PM (last day) Note: Faire grounds open at 10am
item.name: NE Pirate Faire Gloucester & 200th Meetup!!!
